title: Please make the SPAdes genome assembler compatible
body:
For non-bioinformaticians biologists, would be great to be able to run SPAdes, currently among the best genome assemblers, in a windows environment.
http://spades.bioinf.spbau.ru/release3.7.1/manual.html
Following the installation instructions provided
"wget http://spades.bioinf.spbau.ru/release3.7.1/SPAdes-3.7.1-Linux.tar.gz"
"tar -xzf SPAdes-3.7.1-Linux.tar.gz"
"cd SPAdes-3.7.1-Linux/bin/"

comments.body:
Download the source code, and it works on Win10 WSL:

wget http://cab.spbu.ru/files/release3.12.0/SPAdes-3.12.0.tar.gz
tar zxvf SPAdes-3.12.0.tar.gz
cd SPAdes-3.12.0
./spades_compile.sh
./bin/spades.py â€“test
The precompiled version does not run however if you satisfy requirements and compile from the source code it works great.
